title: When are the PBE Signups going to be open again
body: I am just wondering when the PBE signups go to be back up because i really want to take part in the PBE and give feedback for the community.

replies.body: While the PBE signups are still closed for maintenance, you can still be a part of the community and give feedback by posting on the boards! Feel free to make use of the [**Report a Bug**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report) or [**Gameplay **](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards when you come across anything that might need to be patched or tweaked along your games.
